articles.title: World Bank: Delta variant slowing economic growth in East Asia and Pacific - GMA News Online
articles.description: The East Asia and Pacific region's recovery has been undermined by the spread of the COVID-19 Delta variant, which is likely slowing economic growth and increasing inequality in the region, the World Bank said on Monday.
